---
id: validate-pipeline-secret-name
title: "Validate secret name"
description: "Confirms the validity of the given pipeline secret name in a user context. Append `?name=<your_secret_name>`. Append `?workspaceId` to validate the name in a workspace context."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Validate secret name"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pipeline-secrets/validate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Confirms the validity of the given pipeline secret name in a user context. Append `?name=<your_secret_name>`. Append `?workspaceId` to validate the name in a workspace context.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
